Man killed in I-95 incident in Boxford

The man somehow exited a moving vehicle on I-95 in Boxford last night. Police have spoken with a woman and two children who were in that vehicle. (Globe, 8:44 a.m.)

family together again

News

Britain's top court backs
Assange's extradition

Britain's Supreme Court has endorsed the extradition of WikiLeaks chief Julian Assange to Sweden. The top court ruled Wednesday that Assange should be sent to the Scandinavian country to face sex crimes allegations.

Business

Japan starts selling cell phones that monitor radiation

Worries over radiation are so rampant in Japan after last year’s nuclear meltdowns that the world’s first cell phones with built-in radiation monitors are going on sale.
